actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Unemployment Compensation Act Amendments of 1976 (Public Law 94-566).

summary.text: Repeals the provision of the Emergency Jobs and Unemployment Assistance Act of 1974 which denies assistance and waiting period credits under the special unemployment assistance program between academic years or terms to certain nonprofessional employees of educational institutions or agencies.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Unemployment Compensation Act Amendments of 1976 (Public Law 94-566).
